name: bldr_ssjs_lib
description: A lightweight set of SSJS functions to streamline working with the REST API and wsProxy.

assets.name: _ssjs_api
assets.content:
<script runat="server">
  Platform.Load("core", "1.1.1");

  function api() {

    var fn = {}
    fn.auth = function (config) {
      if (!config) { return 'configuration required'; }
      if (!config.clientID) { return 'clientID required'; }
      if (!config.clientSecret) { return 'clientSecret required'; }
      if (!config.grantType) { return 'grantType required'; }
      if (!config.authBase) { return 'authBase required'; }
      if (!config.mid) { return 'account mid required'; }

      var authPayload = {
        client_id: config.clientID,
        client_secret: config.clientSecret,
        grant_type: config.grantType,
        account_id: config.mid
      }

      Write(Stringify(authPayload))
      try {
        var req = new Script.Util.HttpRequest(config.authBase + "v2/token");
        req.emptyContentHandling = 0;
        req.retries = 2;
        req.continueOnError = true;
        req.contentType = "application/json"
        req.method = "POST";
        req.postData = Stringify(authPayload);

        var resp = req.send();
        var resultStr = String(resp.content);
        var resultJSON = Platform.Function.ParseJSON(resultStr);

        Write(Stringify(resultJSON))
        var response = resultJSON["Response"][0];
        var accessToken = resultJSON.access_token;

        return accessToken;

      } catch (err) {
        return err
      }
    }


    fn.scriptUtil = function (config, accessToken) {
      if (!config) { return 'configuration is reqired' }
      if (!config.url) { return 'configuration url is required' }
      if (!accessToken) { return 'unauthenticated' }

      try {
        var req = new Script.Util.HttpRequest(config.url);
        req.emptyContentHandling = 0;
        req.retries = 2;
        req.continueOnError = true;
        req.contentType = "application/json"
        req.method = "GET";
        req.setHeader("Authorization", "Bearer " + accessToken);

        var resp = req.send();
        var resultStr = String(resp.content);
        var resultJSON = Platform.Function.ParseJSON(resultStr);

        return resultJSON;
      } catch (err) {
        return err
      };
    }

    return fn
  }

</script>

assets.name: _ssjs_util
_ssjs_wsproxy
assets.content:
<script runat="server">
  Platform.Load("core", "1.1");

  function wsproxy() {
    var prox = new Script.Util.WSProxy();
    var fn = {};

    /*******************************
     * @config {Object}
     * @continueRequest {Boolean}
     * @return {Array}
     ******************************/
    fn.retrieve = function (config, continueRequest) {
      var reqID = null;
      var moreData = true;
      var continueRequest = continueRequest ? continueRequest : false;
      var obj = config.soapObjName ? config.soapObjName : null;
      var opts = config.opts ? config.opts : {};
      var props = config.props ? config.props : {};
      var filter = config.filter ? config.filter : null;
      var cols = config.cols ? config.cols : util.getRetrievableColumns(obj);
      var mid = config.mid ? config.mid : null;
      prox = mid ? util.proxyContext(prox, mid) : prox;

      if (!config) { return 'configuration required'; }
      if (!obj) { return 'SOAP object is required'; }

      var resultsOut = [];

      // my script to set the values for function
      while (moreData) {
        moreData = false;
        if (reqID == null) {
          if (filter) {
            var data = prox.retrieve(obj, cols, filter, opts, props);
          } else {
            var data = prox.retrieve(obj, cols);
          }
        } else {
          var data = prox.getNextBatch(obj, reqID);
        }

        if (data != null) {
          if (continueRequest) {
            moreData = data.HasMoreRows;
            reqID = data.RequestID;
          }

          //my script to interact with results
          if (data && data.Results) {
            for (var i = 0; i < data.Results.length; i++) {
              resultsOut.push(data.Results[i]);
            }
          }
        }
      }

      var res = {
        results: resultsOut
      }
      return res
    } // end retreive


    /*******************************
     * @config {Object}
     * @return {Object}
     ******************************/
    fn.create = function (config) {
      var obj = config.soapObjName ? config.soapObjName : null;
      var payload = config.payload ? config.payload : null;
      var mid = config.mid ? config.mid : null;
      prox = mid ? util.proxyContext(prox, mid) : prox;

      if (!config) { return 'configuration required'; }
      if (!obj) { return 'configuration required'; }
      if (!payload) { return 'payload is required'; }

      var batch = util.isArray(payload);

      if (batch) {
        var res = prox.createBatch(obj, payload);
      } else {
        var res = prox.createItem(obj, payload);
      }

      return res;
    } // end create

    
    /*******************************
     * @config {Object}
     * @return {Object}
     ******************************/
    fn.update = function (config) {
      var obj = config.soapObjName ? config.soapObjName : null;
      var payload = config.payload ? config.payload : null;
      var options = config.options ? config.options : null;
      var mid = config.mid ? config.mid : null;
      // prox = mid ? util.proxyContext(prox, mid) : prox;

      if (!config) { return 'configuration required'; }
      if (!obj) { return 'SOAP object is required'; }
      if (!payload) { return 'payload is required'; }

      var batch = util.isArray(payload);

      if (batch) {
        var res = prox.updateBatch(obj, payload, options);
      } else {
        var res = prox.updateItem(obj, payload, options);
      }

      return res;
    } // end update


    /*******************************
     * @config {Object}
     * @return {Object}
     ******************************/
    fn.perform = function (config) {
      var obj = config.soapObjName ? config.soapObjName : null;
      var props = config.payload.props ? config.payload.props : {};
      var action = config.payload.action ? config.payload.action : null;
      var opts = config.payload.opts ? config.payload.opts : {};
      var mid = config.mid ? config.mid : null;
      prox = mid ? util.proxyContext(prox, mid) : prox;

      if (!config) { return 'configuration required'; }
      if (!obj) { return 'SOAP object is required'; }
      if (!action) { return 'please include an action' }

      var batch = util.isArray(payload);

      if (batch) {
        var res = prox.performBatch(obj, props, action, opts);
      } else {
        var res = prox.performItem(obj, props, action, opts);
      }

      return res;
    } // end perform

    return fn
  }

</script>

assets.name: _api_config
assets.content:
<script runat="server">
Platform.Load("core", "1.1.1");
/***********************************************
*   
*   // To use these functions within your script use the
*   // the following two lines to initialize the apiConfig settings
*   // and set your accessToken variable.
*   
*   var apiConfig = getAPIConfig();
*   var accessToken = auth(apiConfig, debug, runID); 
***********************************************/

/***********************************************
*
*   function getAPIConfig()
*   Sets all Credentials for RestAPI
*
***********************************************/

  function getAPIConfig() {
    return {
      authBase:"{{authBase}}",
      restBase:"{{restBase}}",
      contentType:"application/json",
      grantType:"client_credentials",
      mid: "{{mid}}",
      clientID:"{{clientID}}",
      clientSecret:"{{clientSecret}}"
    };
  };

</script>

assets.name: ssjs_dataExtensions
assets.content:
<script runat="server">
Platform.Load("core", "1.1.1");

function dataExtensions() {
    var fn = {}
    
    fn.search = function(filter, mid){
        var config = {
            soapObjName: 'DataExtension',
            cols: ['Name','CustomerKey'],
            filter: filter
        }

        if(mid){
            config.mid = mid;
        }

        var resp = ws.retrieve(config)
        
       return resp
    }

    return fn
}
</script>

<script runat="server">

  var ws = wsproxy();

      soapObjName: 'DataExtension',
      cols: []

    util.deBug('Data Extension Lookup', dataExtensionResp, logExtKey, debug)

assets.content:
<script runat="server">
  Platform.Load("core", "1.1")

  var libPath = "Content Builder\\bldr_ssjs_lib\\ssjs_classes"
  Platform.Function.ContentBlockByName(libPath + "\\config\\_api_config")
  Platform.Function.ContentBlockByName(libPath + "\\_ssjs_api")
  Platform.Function.ContentBlockByName(libPath + "\\_ssjs_util")
  Platform.Function.ContentBlockByName(libPath + "\\_ssjs_wsproxy")

  var apiConfig = getAPIConfig();
  var api = api();
  var ws = wsproxy();
  var util = util();

  var debug = 1;
  var logExtKey = null;

  try {

    var createDataExtensionConfig = {
      soapObjName: "DataExtension",
      payload: {
        Name: 'ssjs_lib_de',
        CustomerKey: 'ssjs_lib_de',
        Description: "ssjs_lib_de",
        Fields: [{
          FieldType: "Text",
          Name: "ID",
          MaxLength: 36,
          IsPrimaryKey: true,
          IsNillable: false,
          IsRequired: true
        },
        {
          FieldType: "Text",
          Name: "Name",
          MaxLength: 200
        }]
      } //required
    }

    var createDataExtensionResp = ws.create(createDataExtensionConfig)
    util.deBug('Create Data Extension', createDataExtensionResp, logExtKey, debug)

  } catch (err) {
    util.deBug('Error', err, logExtKey, debug)
  }
</script>

assets.name: performQueryDefinition
assets.content:
<script runat="server">
  Platform.Load("core", "1.1")

  var libPath = "Content Builder\\bldr_ssjs_lib\\ssjs_classes"
  Platform.Function.ContentBlockByName(libPath + "\\config\\_api_config")
  Platform.Function.ContentBlockByName(libPath + "\\_ssjs_api")
  Platform.Function.ContentBlockByName(libPath + "\\_ssjs_util")
  Platform.Function.ContentBlockByName(libPath + "\\_ssjs_wsproxy")

  var apiConfig = getAPIConfig();
  var api = api();
  var ws = wsproxy();
  var util = util();

  var debug = 1;
  var logExtKey = null;

  try {

    // Get Query Definition ObjectID
    var getQueryInformationConfig = {
      soapObjName: 'QueryDefinition',
      cols: [],
      filter: {
        Property: 'Name',
        SimpleOperator: 'equals',
        Value: '{{Query Definition Name}}'
      }
    }

    var getQueryInformationResp = ws.retrieve(getQueryInformationConfig, false)
    util.deBug('Query Definition Response', getQueryInformationResp, logExtKey, debug)


    var queryObjectId = getQueryInformationResp.results[0].ObjectID;
    util.deBug('Query Object ID', queryObjectId, logExtKey, debug)
   

    // Start Query Definition
    var startQueryInformationConfig = {
      soapObjName: "QueryDefinition",
      payload: {
        props: {
          ObjectID: queryObjectId
        },
        action: "start",
        opts: {}
      }
    }

    var startQueryInformationResp = ws.perform(startQueryInformationConfig)
    util.deBug('Start Query Response', startQueryInformationResp, logExtKey, debug)


  } catch (err) {
    util.deBug('Error', err, logExtKey, debug)
  }
</script>

<script runat="server">
  Platform.Load("core", "1.1")

  var libPath = "Content Builder\\bldr_ssjs_lib\\ssjs_classes"
  Platform.Function.ContentBlockByName(libPath + "\\config\\_api_config")
  Platform.Function.ContentBlockByName(libPath + "\\_ssjs_api")
  Platform.Function.ContentBlockByName(libPath + "\\_ssjs_util")
  Platform.Function.ContentBlockByName(libPath + "\\_ssjs_wsproxy")


  var apiConfig = getAPIConfig();
  var api = api();
  var ws = wsproxy();
  var util = util();


  var debug = 1;
  var logExtKey = null;

  try {
    var upsertSingleRecord = {
      soapObjName: "DataExtensionObject",
      payload: {
        CustomerKey: 'ssjs_lib_de',
        Properties: [
          {
            Name: 'ID',
            Value: Platform.Function.GUID()
          },
          {
            Name: 'Name',
            Value: 'Bob'
          }
        ]
      },
      options: {
        SaveOptions: [
          {
            PropertyName: '*',
            SaveAction: 'UpdateAdd'
          }
        ]
      }
    }

    var upsertSingleRecord = ws.update(upsertSingleRecord)
    util.deBug('Upsert Single Record', upsertSingleRecord, logExtKey, debug)


    var upsertMultipleRecordsConfig = {
      soapObjName: "DataExtensionObject",
      payload: [
        {
          CustomerKey: 'ssjs_lib_de',
          Properties: [
            {
              Name: 'ID',
              Value: Platform.Function.GUID()
            },
            {
              Name: 'Name',
              Value: 'Dracula'
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          CustomerKey: 'ssjs_lib_de',
          Properties: [
            {
              Name: 'ID',
              Value: Platform.Function.GUID()
            },
            {
              Name: 'Name',
              Value: 'Mavis'
            }
          ]
        }
      ],
      options: {
        SaveOptions: [
          {
            PropertyName: '*',
            SaveAction: 'UpdateAdd'
          }
        ]
      }
    }

    var upsertMultipleRecords = ws.update(upsertMultipleRecordsConfig)
    util.deBug('Upsert Multiple Records', upsertMultipleRecords, logExtKey, debug)


  } catch (err) {
    util.deBug('Error', err, logExtKey, debug)
  }
</script>
